explanation: The XML tags <PRIZE> were used inconsistently. In some cases, it was written as <PRIZE> and in others as <PRIZE>. These inconsistencies were fixed by replacing all instances of <PRIZE> with <PRICE>. Also, there was a typo in one case where <PRIZE> was written as <PRIZE>, which was also fixed.
